title: 'EasyDict' object has no attribute 'project_path'
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**

DLC = 2.0.4.1
Using GoogleColab

**Describe the problem**

When running training model - deeplabcut.train_network(path_config_file, shuffle=1, displayiters=50,saveiters=250)

Error below....

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-18-b91fd233f3b9> in <module>()
      1 
----> 2 deeplabcut.train_network(path_config_file, shuffle=1, displayiters=50,saveiters=250)
      3 
      4 #this will run until you stop it (CTRL+C), or hit "STOP" icon, or when it hits the end (default, 1.03M iterations).
      5 #Whichever you chose, you will see what looks like an error message, but it's not an error - don't worry....

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/training.py in train_network(config, shuffle, trainingsetindex, gputouse, max_snapshots_to_keep, autotune, displayiters, saveiters, maxiters)
     79           train(str(poseconfigfile),displayiters,saveiters,maxiters,max_to_keep=max_snapshots_to_keep) #pass on path and file name for pose_cfg.yaml!
     80       except BaseException as e:
---> 81           raise e
     82       finally:
     83           os.chdir(str(start_path))

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/training.py in train_network(config, shuffle, trainingsetindex, gputouse, max_snapshots_to_keep, autotune, displayiters, saveiters, maxiters)
     77         os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = str(gputouse)
     78       try:
---> 79           train(str(poseconfigfile),displayiters,saveiters,maxiters,max_to_keep=max_snapshots_to_keep) #pass on path and file name for pose_cfg.yaml!
     80       except BaseException as e:
     81           raise e

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/train.py in train(config_yaml, displayiters, saveiters, maxiters, max_to_keep)
     84     cfg['batch_size']=1 #in case this was edited for analysis.
     85 
---> 86     dataset = create_dataset(cfg)
     87     batch_spec = get_batch_spec(cfg)
     88     batch, enqueue_op, placeholders = setup_preloading(batch_spec)

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/dataset/factory.py in create(cfg)
      7 
      8 def create(cfg):
----> 9     data = PoseDataset(cfg)
     10     return data

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/dataset/pose_dataset.py in __init__(self, cfg)
     69     def __init__(self, cfg):
     70         self.cfg = cfg
---> 71         self.data = self.load_dataset()
     72         self.num_images = len(self.data)
     73         if self.cfg.mirror:

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/dataset/pose_dataset.py in load_dataset(self)
     78     def load_dataset(self):
     79         cfg = self.cfg
---> 80         file_name = os.path.join(self.cfg.project_path,cfg.dataset)
     81         # Load Matlab file dataset annotation
     82         mlab = sio.loadmat(file_name)

AttributeError: 'EasyDict' object has no attribute 'project_path'
